website_summaries.verdict: A one-size-fits-all paddle for people of all sizes.
pros: Adjusts from 65 to 86 inches for adult paddleboarders
Alterations are easily made via the innovative Leverlock handle
The carbon fiber shaft and nylon blade are extremely light as well, allowing the entire unit to weigh just 1.5 pounds
cons: The nylon blade is fairly flimsy and easily bendable

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest light carbon paddle you can find.
customer_reviews.text: I researched a ton before buying this. It's by far the cheapest light carbon paddle available. Be aware of which color you choose because they are made of different material combinations and that affects the weight. I was actually disappointed when I received it at home because it didn't feel much lighter than the aluminum paddle that came with my isup. However, I took it to the lake this weekend and it was so light while I was out on the water that it felt like it wanted to get blown away by the wind! So I'm a happy camper (or paddler).
customer_reviews.author: A Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't love it, not as described, I'll keep it for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: The Fiberglass reinforced nylon blade is really more an easily bendable plastic. I recently broke my paddle after dropping it off a second story and thought this might be a nice replacement. I'm wrong. I'll keep it for my kids paddle board but I can't use it. This would be a great $30 product.
customer_reviews.author: Reko P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Paddle
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in an inexpensive travel paddle (3 piece) I had left my carbon fiber travel paddle on the beach while on vacation in Hawaii and Amazon Prime came to the rescue. I got my paddle in about 5 days but I still had 10 days of vacay to go. Not as light as a carbon fiber paddle but less weight than aluminum. Feels sturdy and well built. Perfect for roadtrips.
customer_reviews.author: Lava Java

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddle. Only minor complaint it was hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle. Only minor complaint it was hard to tighten up so handle didn't slide when using. I couldn't get to tighten without something other than my fingers to grip it, so had to do at home making it harder to adjust when out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon D. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Poor quality and broke after first use. I'm just upset I can't return because I'm outside the window. I guess it serves as a reminder, buy and immediately try.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Chick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great SUP paddle w/o the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great SUP paddle w/o the high price tag. For the price point through Amazon, you cannot beat it. I looked at this same paddle at a very reputable outfitter store and it was twice the cost. This is replacing one I bought through a big-box sporting goods store that lasted only 1 summer. Highly recommend. I am a real person. This was a real purchase with no promotion and/or did not receive anything for this review.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineNMotion

customer_reviews.title: Only for beginners.  Flimsy Paddle Blade
customer_reviews.text: Paddle blade itself isn't very stiff. Fine for beginners but anyone with more than beginner skill will be disappointed. Blade wobbles when paddling with anything other than very light force.
customer_reviews.author: Stefonzo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product for a no so cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Also bought on from dicks sporting goods for $30 and the one from there was a much better quality. This one is very flimsy and I didn't even trust it enough to use it.
customer_reviews.author: alymae

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 4 years now. Sturdy and light weight, just as it claims. It was the best value for carbon fiber paddles when I bought it. Definitely would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reamer

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly so far. Have used it a half dozen times. Adjusted it several times.
customer_reviews.text: Paddle works good. Never owned one before so don't have anything to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. WE USED THIS FOR ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. WE USED THIS FOR THE FIRST TIME LAST WEEKEND IN THE OCEAN AND THE PADDLE TIP COMPLETELY BROKE OFF. I AM TRYING TO CONTACT SOMEONE IN REGARDS TO GETTING A REFUND! BUYERS BEWARE. IT IS NOT WORTH THE 80.00 I SPENT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUP Paddle is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The Paddle is exactly what it show. Haven't used it yet, but love that it matches my SUP. Hopefully it does float since I lost my other paddle that sunk to the bottom of the lake. :( Showed up on time as promised. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Not carbon fiber
customer_reviews.text: I received an aluminum paddle not carbon fiberglass as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: greendkd

customer_reviews.title: nice paddle
customer_reviews.text: lightweight nice paddle. the length adjustment rotates freely, 360 degrees and more.
customer_reviews.author: ITNdesigns

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cheapest carbon fiber paddle I could find
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cheapest carbon fiber paddle I could find. For the novice and intermediate paddles this is great. If you want a more high end paddle there are plenty more out there for a lot more money! For me this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts perfectly.  Light weight.  Great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work perfectly. Light weight and easy to adjust. Looks to be great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Suspence

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want in an affordable SUP paddle. It’s lightweight. It floats. It adjusts to the right length for most adults. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight paddle that has changed my experience on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barr

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one day use!!! Dont buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this paddle as a spare and tested it out today. It broke in one day use. Dont waste your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aldren

customer_reviews.title: Blade is really more an easily bendable plastic
customer_reviews.text: Blade is really more an easily bendable plastic. The handle also rotates easily on it own axis. I had an aluminium paddle with much more quality than this carbon fiber paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Elkin Rodriguez M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the paddle board we have perfect for all sizes
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle! I thought the blade would have a bigger angle, but am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Daly

customer_reviews.title: Just got paddle
customer_reviews.text: I received the bottom part which consists of the paddle but not the rest of the pole
customer_reviews.author: john stavola

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price/value
customer_reviews.text: Have I felt better carbon fiber paddles? Yes. But they were $300+. This paddle is a fraction the weight of my aluminum and it still breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working like it should
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about two weeks and it seems to be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

product_meta.title: KERCO Carbon Fiberglass Adjustable Travel Stand-Up Paddle SUP
product_meta.description: Recreational stand up paddles have reached a new performance level with the Kerco SUP Paddle. Your time on the water should not be a struggle, so we adapted design features from our top of the line paddle to fit a budget. With our 3-piece adjustable design, easily resize length and share with the entire gang
feature_bullets: Kerco Adjustable Fiberglass Stand Up Paddle adjusts from 65 - 86 in. for multiple paddling applications and different size paddlers(Easily fits 4'10" to 6'2"). It weights only 29 oz and floats on the water
Innovative LEVERLOCK handle makes it really easy to adjust the length of the paddle on the fly.To adjust length, simply open the lever on the handle, adjust the length accordingly
Comfortable crescent shaped T handle with anti-slip texture for a secure grip.

Lightweight fiberglass shaft and fiberglass reinforced nylon blade with 92 square inches surface area offers flex on every stroke and high durability,the stiffness of the shaft allows your energy to be transferred to the paddle blade and the dihedra shapel blade design with its perfect stiffness can always keep the momentum up.The result is that you spend less energy in paddling and yet still experience powerful strokes

Shaft Construction:Fiberglass.Blade Construction:Fiberglass reinforced nylon blade.Blade to Shift Offset:10 degree.Blade Size:16” x 8.4”.All Kerco Paddling Gears are supported by Kerco ProTeam here in Wolverine Lake,Michigan. Hassle free customer service is guaranteed.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
